translations.translation: We are enough for you against the mockers,
We are surely sufficient to deal with those who scoff at you,
Surely We suffice to deal with those who scoff at you,
We shall help you against those who mock you
Indeed We suffice you against these mockers.
Truly, We will suffice you against the mockers,
Surely We will suffice you against the scoffers
We suffice thee against the mockers,
Lo! We defend thee from the scoffers,
We will, surely, suffice you against those who mock,
Verily We will suffice unto thee against the mockers.
Indeed We will suffice you against the deriders
For sufficient are We unto thee against those who scoff,-
Truly! We will suffice you against the scoffers.
We suffice you against those who mock,
We are enough for you against the mockers.
Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers

[15:95] Indeed We have sufficed you against the mockers, [who mocked] you, by Our having destroyed each one of them through some harm, and these were: al-Walīd b. al-Mughīra, al-‘Āsī b. Wā’il, ‘Udayy b. Qays, al-Aswad b. al-Muttalib and al-Aswad b. ‘Abd Yaghūth,
(Lo! We defend thee from the scoffers) We have lifted from you the burden of those who deride you,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّا كَفَيْنَاكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِئِينَ } وهم سبعةُ نَفرٍ مِنْ قَريشٍ: الوليدُ بن المُغيرة بن خالد المخزومي، والعاصُ بن وائل السهمي، وأبو زمعة الأَسود بن المطلب، والأَسودُ بن [عبد يغوث] الزهري، والحَارثُ بن قيس السُّهمي، وهو الحَارثُ بن عَيطَلة، وهي أُمهُ، وهَبّارُ بن الأَسود الأَسدي، وعبدُ يغوث بن وهب الزهري

translations.translation: And the saying of Allah: {We have sufficient for you against the scorners} and they are seven people from the Quraish: Al-Walid ibn al-Mughirah ibn Khalid al-Makhzumi, Al-'As ibn Wa'il al-Sahmi, Abu Zam'ah al-Aswad ibn al-Mutalib, Al-Aswad ibn [`Abd Yaghuth] al-Zuhri, Al-Harith ibn Qais al-Suhmi, which is Al-Harith ibn `Ata'ah, and his mother, Habbar ibn al-Aswad al-Asadi, `Ubd Yaghuth ibn Wahb al-Zuhri.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنَّا كَفَيْنَاكَ } أذى { ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِئِينَ } [الحجر: 95] عنك، وانتقمنا لأجلك منهم بأضعاف ما قصدوا بك من الاستهزاء والسخرية
